definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_is_tagged_in"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tag"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">forge:human</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced"><field name="potion">POISON</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">200</field></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_is_tagged_in"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tag"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">forge:boat_tag</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_movement"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="vx"><block type="entity_vel_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="vy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">-0.25</field></block></value><value name="vz"><block type="entity_vel_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
